title: rageblade/runnans interaction
body: runnans bolts seem to not proc the doubled rageblade on hit effect anymore when i tested on practice tool, did i miss something on the notes or is that a bug?

replies.body:
Runnan's unique ability is not counted as an on-hit effect. Rageblade only procs on-hit effects twice. 

Though imagine if it was, since runnans bolts apply on-hit effects themselves. You'd get rageblade procing runnans twice which then would proc rage blade twice, etc. It would be broken as fuck.
